Headline: 12 Roosevelt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt,Ashland ,15th,Loomis,and Roosevelt due to,street blockage near Roosevelt/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #12 Roosevelt  buses are temporarily rerouted via  Roosevelt,Ashland ,15th,Loomis and Roosevelt , due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Ashland.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Jefferson Park. Service  resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on at train at Jefferson Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
